@xworker.html.extjs.ExtJsGridEditorSITpl/@24790/@ExtJs/@Viewport/@items/@DataObjectGridPanel/@24192/@24193/@24194
sname
handler
Scode
#$@text#$@
var store = Ext.StoreMgr.get('${data.gridId?if_exists}_store');
store.insert(store.getCount(), new store.recordType());
#$@text#$@

xworker.html.extjs.Items/@Button
@xworker.html.extjs.ExtJsGridEditorSITpl/@24790/@ExtJs/@Viewport/@items/@DataObjectGridPanel/@24192/@24195/@24196
sname
handler
Scode
#$@text#$@
var grid = Ext.getCmp('${data.gridId?if_exists}');
var store = Ext.StoreMgr.get('${data.gridId?if_exists}_store');
var selModel = grid.getSelectionModel();
var records  = selModel.getSelections();
if(selModel.hasPrevious()){
    selModel.selectPrevious();
}else if(selModel.hasNext()){
    selModel.selectNext();
}
store.remove(records);
#$@text#$@
shaveTypeInCode
false
sdescriptors
xworker.html.extjs.Ext.Button/@24224
@xworker.html.extjs.ExtJsGridEditorSITpl/@24790/@ExtJs/@Viewport/@items/@DataObjectGridPanel/@24197
sname
selModel
sdescriptors

true

true
sname

sdescriptors
xworker.html.extjs.Ext.grid.GridPanel/@25028/@RowSelectionModel
